text: "Brilliant Mind" is a song by British band Furniture, from their second album The Wrong People. Released as a single in 1986, it reached No. 21 on the UK Singles Chart in July of that year, and remains as the band's only hit song to chart. The song was featured in the John Hughes film Some Kind of Wonderful and appears on the film's soundtrack. ==References== Category:1986 singles Category:British new wave songs Category:Songs written by Jim Irvin Category:Stiff Records singles Category:1986 songs
